name: select2-component
description: A vuejs, reactjs and angular select component.

scripts.cleancss: cleancss -o dist/select2.min.css dist/select2.css && cleancss -o demo/index.bundle.css dist/select2.min.css ./node_modules/github-fork-ribbon-css/gh-fork-ribbon.css
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf demo/*.bundle-*.js && rimraf demo/*.bundle-*.css
scripts.file2variable: file2variable-cli src/vue.template.html -o src/vue-variables.ts --html-minify && file2variable-cli src/angular.template.html -o src/angular-variables.ts --html-minify
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run file2variable && npm run tsc && npm run lessc && npm run cleancss && npm run webpack && npm run rev-static
scripts.lint: npm run tslint && npm run stylelint

author: York Yao
